name: nestjs-playground
description: Playground project for NestJS with Docker setup
author: Siarhei Bokuts

scripts.docker:up:db: yarn docker:prepare:network && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.db.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:up:backend: yarn docker:prepare:network && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.backend.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:up:frontend: yarn docker:prepare:network && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.frontend.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:up:all: yarn docker:prepare:network && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.all.yml up -d --build
